about_the_game:
Thanks for checking out Combat Pilot. We're a new hardcore combat flight-simulator for the PC set in the Pacific Theater of WWII.

Do you remember a time when there were many different combat flight-sim titles to choose from on the PC? We certainly do and miss those days. Like you, we want to see more choices in the genre and help inspire virtual pilots both young and old to take to the digital skies. We want to offer the CFS community another option besides the usual two or three titles that have been on the market for decades. More warbirds, more theaters, more features and more competition is good for the genre.

Combat Pilot aims to bring a high-quality flight and fighting experience to you by harnessing the power and flexibility of Unreal Engine 5+. We are currently building our inaugural retail product and in the process of mating our powerful flight-model and physics solution to UE5.

Initial Combat Pilot titles will be modest in scope and features and focus on the fundamental technology and elements needed to make a successful CFS franchise. Each Combat Pilot title will build upon the previous and come together create a comprehensive combat flight-sim experience. Early content will include the following:

  • Flyable F4F-4 Wildcat and A6M2 Model 21 "Zero"

  • USS Enterprise and IJN Akagi aircraft carriers

  • Realistic carrier take-offs and landings

  • Midway Atoll

Combat Pilot is property of Combat Pilot LLC and is being developed by Entropy Aero, a subsidiary of Barbedwire Studios, in partnership with Skystreak Productions LLC. Team members include veterans of the Gates of Hell real-time tactical strategy series and long-time flight-sim producer Jason Williams whose past work includes IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles and Rise of Flight: The First Great Air War. Entropy Aero also employs several aerospace industry experts utilizing the latest in computational technology and tools along with veterans of other combat flight-sim franchises.

content_descriptors.notes: Combat Pilot presents a realistic depiction of WWII air combat and radio communications, as well as historically-accurate land and sea battlefields.

short_description: Combat Pilot is a new hardcore combat flight-simulation set in the Pacific Theater during WWII. Combat Pilot aims to be a leader in the CFS genre of PC gaming and finally bring a new, comprehensive Pacific themed aerial combat experience to virtual fighter and bomber pilots around the world.
